text: man-il hananim-ui eunchong-gwa jabiga geudaeege eobs-eossdamyeon geudeul gaun de muliga geudaeleul banghwangke halyeo eum mohaess-eulila geuleona geudeul-eun seuseulo leul haechyeoss-eul ppun geudaeleul haechin geos-eun amugeosdo eobs-eossnola hananim-eun geudae ege seongseowa jihyeleul jusyeossgo geudae ga alji moshaessdeon geos-eul galeuchyeo jusyeoss nani geudaee daehan hananim-ui eunchong eun widae hasim-ila
